label: A3B_hR8_166_h_c-001
title: SnP$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
The Sn-P phase diagram has three known phases (Zavrazhnova, 2018): \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_hR8_166_h_c-001}{SnP$_{3}$} (this structure) \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B4_hR7_166_ac_2c-002}{Sn$_{4}$P$_{3}$} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A16B3_hR19_166_2c2h_ac-001}{Sn$_{3}$P$_{4}$} \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
